2.title: Wylde Rumors
2.plot: Aunt Rachel grounds Heather for entering the Jordan Hamilton competition behind her back. The grounding includes Heather working at Rachel's coffee shop every weekend for the next two months, a two-month span which includes Heather working on the shop's busiest night of the week, Friday Karaoke Night (where the mean girls like to hang). Against her better judgment, Rachel allows Heather to style Jordan realizing that it is a chance of a lifetime.

imdb.plot outline: Social leper Heather Wylde has her boring, ordinary life turned upside down when the fledgling fashion designer and self proclaimed "weird kid" wins the right to style Jordan Hamilton, the hottest pop star on the planet for one of his special appearances. Heather's success irks Michelle Barber the High School's resident mean girl who sincerely believes that no one at that school should ever out shine her. Ever. Heather's unique designs are a hit making her literally an overnight fashion sensation.
imdb.title: Get Wylde
plot: Social leper Heather Wylde has her boring, ordinary life turned upside down when the fledgling fashion designer and self proclaimed "weird kid" wins the right to style Jordan Hamilton, the hottest pop star on the planet for one of his special appearances. Heather's success irks Michelle Barber the High School's resident mean girl who sincerely believes that no one at that school should ever out shine her. Ever. Heather's unique designs are a hit making her literally an overnight fashion sensation.::Lamont Magee
